articles.title: Elon Musk As Adviser? What Indian-American US Presidential Candidate Said - NDTV
articles.description: The youngest Presidential candidate from the Republican Party Vivek Ramaswamy suggested that he would like to bring Elon Musk on as an advisor if elected President in the US Presidential elections 2024, according to The Hill.
articles.content:
To put America first, we need to rediscover what America is, said Vivek Ramaswamy.
